sense.def:
To suffer pain or an illness
pomeni čutiti bolečino ali biti bolan.

seg.quote: She was suffering violent abdominal pains.
Seventy-five percent of its population suffers from malnutrition.

sense.def:
To suffer
pomeni imeti velike težave zaradi neprijetnega dogodka ali okoliščin.

seg.quote: We were warned to support the government or suffer the consequences.
They would be the first to suffer if these proposals were ever carried out.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
suffers
, postane slabše, ker tisto zanemarimo ali ker so okoliščine neugodne.

seg.quote: I'm not surprised that your studies are suffering.
